sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sn_nb_action_rule_context</collection> <condition>!((current.operation() == 'update') && (previous.getValue('context') == current.getValue('context')))</condition> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Avoid duplicate entry for context</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) { var recommendationContextGr = new GlideRecord('sn_nb_action_rule_context'); recommendationContextGr.addQuery('context', current.getValue('context')); recommendationContextGr.query(); if (recommendationContextGr.next()) { gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("A table can have one recommendation context record. The context record for this table already exists")); current.setAbortAction(true); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-05-05 02:25:47</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>205ac70deb1301103ff92fd05d522820</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Avoid duplicate entry for context</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Recommended Actions" source="sn_nb_action">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Recommended Actions">427fe83177221010d7159b71a91061e1</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_205ac70deb1301103ff92fd05d522820</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-25 07:07:20</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=205ac70deb1301103ff92fd05d522820"/> </record_update>
